error.message: The current type, Auction.BussinessLogic.Services.IAuctionProvider, is an interface and cannot be constructed. Are you missing a type mapping?
error.detail:
System.InvalidOperationException: An error occurred when trying to create a controller of type 'Auction.Presentation.Controllers.BidController'.
